TopicTitle: Should I novelize Macey Dean's stories?

Articles.Content:
A simple yes or no question, people.

I'm heavily considering writing a series of short stories that follow the story created by @Macey, so long ago.

Now, I have no way of getting his permission for this. So I can only hope that he would approve.

Do you guys want me to write it? I plan to start once I finish my current story.
Okay... KSP vid, written, or drawn?

Just now, Joseph Kerman said:

Okay... KSP vid, written, or drawn?

Written.

Looks like a decision has been reached.

Once I've finished my current project. I will begin.
Not without his permission. There is probably a way...

Just now, Bill Phil said:

Not without his permission. There is probably a way...

How?

Just now, daniel l. said:

How?

I don't know. I know I wouldn't do it unless I had permission. Maybe make some alterations and say it's inspired by the Spiritwolf Series by Macey Dean.

13 minutes ago, Bill Phil said:

I don't know. I know I wouldn't do it unless I had permission. Maybe make some alterations and say it's inspired by the Spiritwolf Series by Macey Dean.

Of course. There will definitely be alterations. There has to be.

I'm removing all KSP-related elements. Such as removing all the planets except those relevant to the story and renaming the others.

I also plan to make Spiritwolf vs Hanland less of a good vs evil conflict. It will be more of a gray for both sides, with each having valid points.

Also, I'm going to replace the Kerbals with human characters. And the weapon armaments will become more Battlestar-esque than the stock game @Macey used would permit. (Torpedos replaced by missiles, for example.)

But the basic plot from beginning to end will remain the same. I also plan to invent some more stories; such as a continuation of Macey's unfinished Laniakea arc.

7 minutes ago, daniel l. said:

Of course. There will definitely be alterations. There has to be.

I'm removing all KSP-related elements. Such as removing all the planets except those relevant to the story and renaming the others.

I also plan to make Spiritwolf vs Hanland less of a good vs evil conflict. It will be more of a gray for both sides, with each having valid points.

Also, I'm going to replace the Kerbals with human characters. And the weapon armaments will become more Battlestar-esque than the stock game @Macey used would permit. (Torpedos replaced by missiles, for example.)

But the basic plot from beginning to end will remain the same. I also plan to invent some more stories; such as a continuation of Macey's unfinished Laniakea arc.

Sure, man. Go for it.

But the basic plot from beginning to end will remain the same. I also plan to invent some more stories; such as a continuation of Macey's unfinished Laniakea arc.

It was already grey. Spiritwolf broke international law.
